title: Mesh font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171906im_/http:/www.graphicdeclaration.com/images/MeshFont_S_stencil.jpg)

Every now and then I get a chance to work on my next\* font which I think of it as a mesh font but I guess it's just another pixel font. It will come in both serif and sans serif and all will have the characteristic of ruff cut messiness :)

Shown is the stencil serif S with color fill. When all's done\*\* it will have three weights and one weight in stencil ...maybe two if this thing keeps growing.

\*I have something like a half dozen fonts in 'progress'.  
\*\*So far I have 5 letters in satisfactory state, and some punctuation marks.

Just thought I'd share.

n.
author: 5star

comments.content:
Ruff cut mesh messiness ...is hard to say.

n.
So is this for just very large display? Like one or two letters at a time?
